name: The Residences at St. Regis Chicago
description:
st-regis-chicago St Regis, Chicago The Residences at St. Regis Chicago redefines luxury living through an exceptional collection of world-class amenities designed to elevate every aspect of daily life. From wellness and entertainment to business and leisure, every facility reflects the impeccable standards of the St. Regis brand, ensuring residents experience uncompromising comfort and convenience within their exclusive urban sanctuary.

Amenities Include:
24-Hour Security & Concierge

Boardroom & Co-Working Spaces

name: nan
description:
Chicago's Third-Tallest Tower: Where Architectural Brilliance Meets Lakefront Luxury Experience the pinnacle of sophisticated urban living in Studio Gang's crystalline masterpiece, a 101-story icon soaring above Lake Michigan, offering 360-degree views and unparalleled St. Regis service. St Regis The Residences at St. Regis Chicago Chicago st-regis-chicago 2021-10-15 The Residences at St. Regis Chicago: Jeanne Gang's Shimmering Gemstone Redefining Luxury Living Welcome to The Residences at St. Regis Chicago, where architectural innovation converges with legendary hospitality. Designed by internationally acclaimed architect Jeanne Gang of Studio Gang, this 101-story crystalline tower stands as Chicago's third-tallest building and the world's tallest structure designed by a woman-led team. Rising majestically from the prestigious Lakeshore East neighborhood, the building's three interconnected masses reach skyward at 47, 71, and 93 stories, creating a distinctive silhouette that recalls the brilliance of a multi-faceted gemstone catching light across the skyline.

This extraordinary development offers 393 uniquely crafted residences, ranging from sophisticated one-bedroom sanctuaries to expansive five-bedroom penthouses spanning up to 6,800 square feet. Each home showcases meticulous attention to detail, with interiors by world-renowned Hirsch Bedner Associates featuring gourmet kitchens by Snaidero USA with Gaggenau and Thermador appliances, spa-inspired bathrooms with Kallista fixtures, and color palettes inspired by precious stones, sapphire, amethyst, topaz, and fluorite. Residents enjoy the ultimate address where bespoke St. Regis service, a dedicated 47th-floor amenity level, and direct access to the five-star hotel create an uncompromising standard of luxury living. A Crystalline Vision: Where Architectural Poetry Meets the Chicago Sky Jeanne Gang's visionary design transforms the ordinary into the extraordinary, drawing inspiration from the natural brilliance of gemstones to create an architectural landmark that captures and refracts light across the Chicago skyline. The tower's form, a seemingly undulating crystalline façade, is achieved through an ingenious interplay of geometric frustums and six varying shades of blue-green glass, chosen to mirror the ever-changing moods of Lake Michigan. This is not simply a building; it is a living sculpture that breathes with the city, each angle revealing new facets, new perspectives, and new connections to the water and sky beyond.

The architectural philosophy extends beyond aesthetic beauty to embrace sustainability and innovation. More than 75% of construction materials were diverted back into manufacturing processes, while the structure's stepped profile and perimeter columns that move inward and outward create unique spaces within each residence—no two homes are identical. Gang's approach celebrates Chicago's rich architectural heritage while boldly advancing it into the future. Here, at the confluence of the Chicago River and Lake Michigan, residents inhabit spaces that feel simultaneously grounded in the natural world and elevated above it, where every window frames not just a view but a constantly evolving panorama of urban and natural grandeur. The Pinnacle of Prestige: 101 Stories of Uncompromising Luxury • Location: 363 East Wacker Drive
• Height & Distinction: 1,198 feet, 101 stories—Chicago's third-tallest building
• Residences: 393 luxury condominiums
• Layouts: One to five-bedroom homes, including full-floor Sky 360 penthouses with 360-degree views
• Interior Design: Hirsch Bedner Associates with custom millwork by Snaidero USA, premium Gaggenau and Thermador appliances, Kallista fixtures
• Architecture: Designed by Jeanne Gang, Studio Gang Architects; structural engineering by Magnusson Klemencic Associates
• Completion: 2020, with ongoing sales of exclusive residences
• Developer: Magellan Development Group in partnership with Parcel C LLC under St. Regis licensing The 47th Floor Sanctuary: An Entire Level Devoted to Your Every Desire Ascend to an oasis where wellness, entertainment, and social connection converge with breathtaking views across a dedicated 47,000-square-foot amenity floor. The entire forty-seventh floor transforms luxury living into an art form, offering residents a private retreat elevated above the city. Step onto the expansive sky terrace featuring an outdoor swimming pool and spa, surrounded by a serene Zen garden terrace where you can unwind while drinking in panoramic vistas of Lake Michigan, the Chicago River, and the glittering cityscape. Inside, the residents' lounge and private dining room provide elegant venues for intimate gatherings, while the demonstration kitchen and wine-tasting room invite culinary adventures. Golf enthusiasts can perfect their swing in the state-of-the-art golf simulator, while the conference center accommodates professional needs with sophisticated style. A private cinema offers entertainment in an intimate setting, and the children's activity room ensures younger residents have their own dedicated space for play and creativity.

Beyond the 47th floor, residents enjoy seamless access to the five-star St. Regis Hotel's exceptional amenities. The hotel's 5,600-square-foot fitness center features cutting-edge equipment, yoga studios, and training spaces, complemented by steam and sauna rooms. The St. Regis Spa provides world-class treatments, while the indoor pool offers year-round aquatic indulgence. Additional conveniences include 24-hour concierge service, on-demand Tesla vehicles, a dog lounge with an indoor run, receiving room for packages, and direct access to two acclaimed restaurants, Miru, featuring Japanese cuisine by Chef Hisanobu Osaka, and Tre Dita, a Tuscan steakhouse by Chef Evan Funke. Every amenity reflects the St. Regis commitment to bespoke, anticipatory service. Lakeshore East: Where Chicago's Finest Experiences Meet at Your Doorstep • Millennium Park – 0.5 miles
• Navy Pier – 0.8 miles
• The Magnificent Mile – 0.6 miles
• Grant Park & Museum Campus – 1.2 miles
• Chicago Riverwalk – directly adjacent
• Maggie Daley Park – 0.4 miles
• Theater District – 0.7 miles
• Lakefront Trail – immediate access Magellan Development Group: Visionaries of Chicago's Most Distinguished Addresses Magellan Development Group Magellan Development Group stands at the forefront of luxury real estate development in Chicago, with an impressive portfolio that has redefined the city's skyline and elevated its residential landscape. As the mastermind behind the award-winning Lakeshore East master-planned community, Magellan has demonstrated an unwavering commitment to architectural excellence, urban innovation, and quality of life. The firm's collaboration with visionary architects, from hiring Jeanne Gang to design both the acclaimed Aqua Tower and The St. Regis Chicago, showcases their dedication to pushing architectural boundaries while maintaining the highest standards of construction and resident experience.

The St. Regis Chicago represents Magellan's most ambitious achievement to date, bringing together world-class design, legendary St. Regis hospitality, and the prime location at the intersection of Chicago's river and lakefront. Under Magellan's stewardship, the development secured strategic partnerships, navigated complex urban planning approvals, and delivered a supertall tower that respects Chicago's architectural heritage while boldly advancing it. Their attention to detail extends from selecting premium materials and finishes to curating amenities that anticipate residents' every need. With The St. Regis Chicago, Magellan has created not just another luxury address, but an icon that will define sophisticated urban living for generations to come.

name: nan
description:
Where legendary elegance meets Singapore's most prestigious address. Experience the pinnacle of refined living in District 10, where two iconic towers rise above Orchard Road, offering an extraordinary sanctuary of timeless sophistication and world-class butler service. St Regis St. Regis Residences Singapore Singapore st-regis-singapore 2018-10-18 St. Regis Residences Singapore: A Legacy of Uncompromising Luxury on Tanglin Road Nestled in the heart of Singapore's most coveted District 10, St. Regis Residences represents the harmonious union of legendary hospitality and exceptional residential design. This distinguished 999-year leasehold development, completed in 2008, comprises two elegant 23-storey towers housing 173 exquisite residences, each a masterpiece of contemporary architecture and refined living. Adjacent to the renowned St. Regis Hotel, this exclusive address places residents mere steps from Orchard Road's world-famous shopping district while maintaining an atmosphere of serene privacy and sophistication.

Developed by Richmond Hotel Pte Ltd, a prestigious joint venture between City Developments Limited, Hong Leong Holdings Limited, and TID Pte Ltd, these residences embody over six decades of development excellence. Every sky villa and sky suite has been meticulously crafted to deliver not merely accommodation, but an unparalleled lifestyle. From the moment you arrive, the inspired details and exquisite ambience reveal themselves as more than prelude; they define a new standard of urban living where every need is anticipated and every pleasure fulfilled. A Timeless Retreat Where Sumptuous Beauty Meets Incomparable Design The vision behind St. Regis Residences transcends conventional luxury. Here, architectural excellence converges with the storied heritage of the St. Regis brand, a name synonymous with the finest in private residences worldwide. Each residence has been conceived as an unparalleled retreat of refined grace, where minimalist facades belie the extraordinary opulence within. Sky villas adorned with breathtaking vistas create a sanctuary above the city, while thoughtfully appointed interiors showcase state-of-the-art efficiency married to elegant aesthetics.

This is living elevated to art form. Behind the contemporary exterior lies a world where no feature is too extravagant, no detail too insignificant. From meticulously crafted bathroom fixtures by Dornbracht, world leaders in high-end design, to the sophisticated wardrobe systems by Truggelmann of Germany, every element reflects impeccable taste. The architectural vision embraces both form and function, creating residences where style and livability unite seamlessly. This is not simply a place to reside; it is the perfect extension of your own highly refined world, positioned at one of the world's most sophisticated addresses. Distinguished Living on a 999-Year Leasehold: Details That Define Excellence Tenure: 999-year leasehold commencing November 24, 1995
Total Units: 173 meticulously designed residences
Configuration: 3 to 4-bedroom sky villas and sky suites
Development Size: Approximately 16,694 square meters
Completion: 2008 (Temporary Occupation Permit issued)
Location: 31 & 33 Tanglin Road, Singapore 247912, District 10
Developer: Richmond Hotel Pte Ltd
Fixtures & Fittings: Dornbracht bathroom fixtures; Truggelmann wardrobe systems Beyond Imagination: Where World-Class Amenities Meet Legendary Butler Service Every comfort anticipated. Every desire fulfilled. Experience a lifestyle where sophistication meets convenience through St. Regis's legendary tradition of personalized excellence. At St. Regis Residences, you don't simply live, you experience a curated lifestyle perfected over a century of hospitality heritage. The crown jewel of residential amenities is the renowned St. Regis Butler Service, an unparalleled offering that remains unsurpassed anywhere in the world. Your personal butler anticipates every need with flawless, personalized attention, from unpacking luggage and delivering morning coffee to coordinating in-residence services and arranging special occasions. This living legacy of founder John Jacob Astor IV's vision ensures that the rare luxury of time itself becomes yours.

Beyond butler service, residents enjoy access to an exceptional array of facilities designed for rejuvenation and leisure. Relax poolside at the resort-style swimming pool and deck, perfect for unwinding against a backdrop of tropical landscaping. Maintain your wellness routine at the fully-equipped gymnasium featuring state-of-the-art equipment and stunning views. The development's three-level basement carpark provides secure, convenient access. Additional lifestyle amenities include BBQ areas for intimate gatherings, lush landscaped gardens, and 24-hour security for complete peace of mind. Every element has been thoughtfully designed to create an environment where luxury living meets effortless convenience, all within the embrace of the world's most distinguished residential brand. Prime District 10: Where Prestige Meets Accessibility Orchard Road Shopping District – 2-5 minutes' walk
Tanglin Mall, Forum The Shopping Mall, Tanglin Shopping Centre
Orchard MRT Station – Major transportation hub
Singapore Botanic Gardens – UNESCO World Heritage Site
International Schools
Medical Facilities
Fine Dining
Cultural Attractions
Embassy Row
Central Business District Built by Visionaries: The CDL Legacy of Excellence City Developments Limited (CDL) St. Regis Residences Singapore is brought to life by Richmond Hotel Pte Ltd, a distinguished joint venture uniting three titans of Singapore real estate: City Developments Limited (CDL), Hong Leong Holdings Limited, and TID Pte Ltd. This powerhouse collaboration combines over 60 years of CDL's unparalleled expertise with the financial strength and development acumen of Hong Leong Holdings and TID's specialized knowledge. CDL stands as Singapore's property pioneer and a leading global real estate company, with an extensive network spanning 168 locations across 29 countries. As one of Singapore Exchange's largest companies by market capitalization, CDL has developed over 53,000 homes and owns approximately 23 million square feet of residential, commercial, and hospitality assets globally. The developer's commitment to excellence is reflected in its unprecedented achievement: winning the EdgeProp Singapore Excellence Awards' Top Developer honor for eight consecutive years, a record no other developer has matched. Beyond shaping Singapore's skyline with architectural icons, CDL has transformed the nation's built environment through pioneering green building innovations and has been recognized with the prestigious BCA Green Mark Platinum Champion Award. This legacy of quality, sustainability, and visionary development ensures that St. Regis Residences represents not just a home, but an enduring testament to Singapore's finest residential craftsmanship.

name: The St. Regis Residences, Turks & Caicos
description:
st-regis-turks-caicos St Regis, Turks & Caicos The St. Regis signature lifestyle elevates everyday moments into extraordinary experiences, offering residents unparalleled access to world-class facilities and services. From resort-style aquatic leisure to championship athletic pursuits, every amenity has been thoughtfully designed to exceed the expectations of the most discerning residents, creating a Caribbean sanctuary where luxury and convenience converge effortlessly.

Amenities Include:
Four resort-style swimming pools
State-of-the-art wellness complex
Professional fitness center
Championship tennis facilities
Exclusive children's club
Elegant casino offering sophisticated gaming entertainment
Three distinctive dining venues
Legendary 24-hour St. Regis butler service
Dedicated concierge services
607 feet of pristine private Grace Bay Beach access

name: nan
description:
Where Warm Tropical Weather and Impeccable Service Welcome You to Extraordinary Living Experience the pinnacle of Caribbean luxury on Grace Bay Beach, where three elegant towers rise above 607 feet of pristine oceanfront across 17 magnificent acres of paradise. St Regis The St. Regis Residences, Turks & Caicos Turks & Caicos st-regis-turks-caicos 2028-10-06 The St. Regis Residences, Turks & Caicos – Where Timeless Sophistication Meets Beachfront Bliss Discover an unprecedented level of luxury at The St. Regis Residences, the premier destination in Turks & Caicos, where exquisite sophistication blends seamlessly with stunning oceanfront vistas. Perched along the immaculate shores of the globally celebrated Grace Bay Beach, this exceptional ultra-luxury beachfront branded residence elevates seaside living with flawless design, world-class amenities, and unmatched service.

This magnificent development encompasses three residential towers providing residents with the ultimate in bespoke services and style. Bathed in refreshing sea breezes and the dynamic shimmer of ever-changing sunlight, The St. Regis Residences offer a truly exceptional environment to immerse oneself in natural beauty. From the moment you arrive, the warm tropical climate and impeccable service invite you to a unique path toward living extraordinarily. Set to debut in late 2027, this is where contemporary architecture meets timeless sophistication on one of the world's most stunning beaches. Ataraxia Realized – A Sanctuary Designed for Tranquility of Mind The architectural vision for The St. Regis Residences celebrates the singularity of Turks & Caicos, with the region's topography and storied history informing every detail from landscaping to art installations. Through a holistic approach, the design captures the natural tones, organic forms, and rich textures of the surrounding crystal-clear waters, white sand, and tropical foliage throughout each space. The sleek contemporary building facade harmonizes perfectly with the bold elegance of the interiors, creating an experience that is both island-elegant and inherently luxurious.

Upon entering these meticulously crafted residences, owners are greeted by opulent living spaces that set the tone for an unparalleled living experience. Every nuance has been masterfully crafted in the time-honored traditions of St. Regis, where contemporary finishes and clean lines create a genuine sense of place. The vision extends beyond architecture to embrace a philosophy of living where excellence is not merely promised but delivered daily, and where every moment spent at home becomes truly extraordinary amid the radiant glow of Caribbean sunlight. Exclusivity Defined: Just 96 Beachfront Residences Across Three Towers • Property Size: Spanning 17 acres of pristine Grace Bay Beach oceanfront
• Total Residences: 96 exclusive beachfront condominiums
• Residence Types: Thoughtfully designed 1, 2, and 3-bedroom residences 
• Completion Date: Late 2027, 2028
• Architecture & Design: OBMI Architects
• Location: Grace Bay, Providenciales, Turks and Caicos Islands
• Developer: Desarrollos Hotelco Group, licensed by Marriott International
• Price Range: Prices available upon request – contact sales team for availability A World of Indulgence: Four Pools, Three Dining Venues, and St. Regis Signature Service From legendary butler service to casino evenings and spa sanctuaries, every amenity reflects the St. Regis commitment to unrivaled hospitality and bespoke living. Residents enjoy exclusive access to an extraordinary collection of resort-style amenities designed to exceed every expectation. Four luxurious swimming pools invite relaxation throughout the estate, while tennis facilities offer active recreation under Caribbean skies. Families will appreciate the dedicated children's club, and wellness enthusiasts will discover their sanctuary in the state-of-the-art oceanfront wellness complex featuring both comprehensive spa services and cutting-edge fitness facilities.

For those seeking entertainment and culinary excellence, an elegant casino awaits alongside three distinctive dining venues showcasing cosmopolitan fare that satisfies the most discerning palates. The exclusive beach club provides uncrowded access to Grace Bay's legendary shores, while in-residence dining and catering services bring gourmet experiences directly to your door. The legendary St. Regis butler service ensures your every need is anticipated and exceeded, providing ultra-responsiveness that defines the brand's ethos of unwavering attentiveness. A dedicated concierge team stands ready to curate bespoke experiences that reflect your personal tastes, whether arranging conch shell hunting expeditions on fine white sands or orchestrating private snorkeling adventures in Grace Bay's underwater playground of vivid coral reefs. Through the fully integrated ONVIA owner recognition platform and Marriott Bonvoy™ Elite Membership, owners gain access to exclusive events, unparalleled experiences, and VIP benefits at Marriott properties worldwide. Grace Bay & Beyond: Positioned in Paradise Grace Bay & Beyond: Positioned in Paradise
Prime Beachfront Location: Situated directly on Grace Bay Beach
Providenciales International Airport: 90 minutes from Miami, 550 miles southeast of Miami
Grace Bay Neighborhood: Walking distance to luxury boutiques and epic culinary journeys
Water Activities: Immediate access to world-class snorkeling, scuba diving, and water sports
Downtown Providenciales: Short drive to shopping, dining, and entertainment options
Ecotourism Opportunities: Explore  the natural beauty of Turks & Caicos' 40 islands and cays Desarrollos Hotelco Group: Visionaries of Caribbean Luxury Desarrollos Hotelco Group Desarrollos Hotelco Group brings distinguished expertise in developing ultra-luxury Caribbean properties that honor both location and legacy. As the developer behind The St. Regis Residences, Turks & Caicos, the group operates under an exclusive license from Marriott International, ensuring that every aspect of the project upholds the renowned standards of the St. Regis brand. The groundbreaking ceremony, held in March 2024 and attended by Premier Washington Misick, Minister of Tourism Josephine Connolly, and key government officials, marked a pivotal moment in the hospitality landscape of the Turks and Caicos Islands. Under the leadership of Director Roberto Stipa and in partnership with Christie's International Real Estate, Desarrollos Hotelco Group is committed to creating not just a residence but a beacon of excellence that welcomes discerning owners from around the world. Their vision extends beyond construction to encompass economic growth, job creation, and cultural enrichment for the local community, while delivering an incomparable island lifestyle where relaxation is effortless and every detail reflects the meticulous craftsmanship expected of the St. Regis name. Through their dedication and perseverance, they are redefining luxury living in the heart of Grace Bay.
